title: Sonos PLAY:3
description:
Sonos PLAY:3 is the versatile, all-in-one player with big sound in a compact size. With three integrated speakers and three digital amps, Sonos PLAY:3 streams all the music on earth wirelessly in any room for wall-to-wall sound. Set up the player vertically or horizontally. Control with the Sonos Controller App for iOS, Android, Mac or PC.

Sonos Your Home 
All your music in every room in amazing HiFi sound. Wirelessly.  

Abt is a proud authorized retailer of Sonos Home Audio products. Shop for the Sonos PLAY:3 Speaker and the full line of Sonos Home Audio products at Abt!
